# (PART) Quality Check {-}

# Introduction to quality control {#qcheck .unnumbered}

***
This third section presents the harmonized variables in SARMD and provides the results of conducting a quality check (qckeck) on these variables. 

**Chapter 7** is a dictionary of harmonized variables. It presents all the harmonized variables available in SARMD. 

**Chapter 8**  tabulates the frequencies in the values of categorical variables.   

**Chapter 9** presents the frequency of missing values and zeros in the variables.
